Articles.Content: its already possible to reload the ENTIRE Database ingame. so why not certain textures/CFGs/models. so you dont have to wait for the ENTIRE Game to effectively reload itself, which would be usefull when KSP decides not to find your model despite it being properly pointed to in the CFG(but thats a story for another time)

I've set up a separate ksp install in which I only place items I'm testing...this speeds up the load time a lot because it's only loading items I'm working on.

Not exactly what you're asking for, but it's a decent workaround
I think it could create a dependency conflict. Yada yada yada ... the whole tedious inevitability unfolds itself.
